results.definition: a local branch of some fraternity or association
an ecclesiastical assembly of the monks in a monastery or even of the canons of a church
any distinct period in history or in a person's life
examples: the industrial revolution opened a new chapter in British history
the divorce was an ugly chapter in their relationship

results.definition: a series of related events forming an episode
a subdivision of a written work; usually numbered and titled
examples: he read a chapter every night before falling asleep
